<RESUME_START>
VICE-PRESIDENT DATA AND MARKETING TECHNOLOGY
Professional Summary
I help media companies succeed with digital products and customer experiences.
My passion is helping people and organizations transform, grow, and thrive with a unique mix of strategy, marketing, product, and technology leadership.
This expertise has been developed over twenty years spent building successful digital businesses and products - across the world.

SKILLS

Team leadership Budgeting and finance Process implementation Project management
Staff development Strong verbal communication Extremely organized
Work History

04/2017 to Current
Vice-President Data and Marketing Technology
Company Name
— City , State
Driving evolution of the firm into a data-driven marketing company, leading the design and delivery of data-driven products, services, strategies, and platforms.
Setting the strategy and direction for a newly formed Data Division while hitting ambitious growth targets.
Leadership of in-house startup Orchestrate, which is a marketing funnel automation and lead nurturing platform for B2B markets that capitalizes on content marketing.
Leading full life cycle product development for data & data-driven products, including market research, positioning, processes, and technology.
Acting as product owner for data and martech across all platforms in our Agile processes.
Ensuring compliance with data privacy legislation functioning as Data Protection Officer.

03/2011 to 03/2017
Vice-President Digital Media
Company Name
— City , State
Responsible for shaping and executing product vision and strategy and driving digital business transformation.
Led product management, digital marketing, and digital strategy.
Responsible for 35 reports, budget of $5 million, 100+ web sites, 80+ mobile apps, matrix P&L owner for $25+ million digital business.
Led product development, market research, digital strategy, internal digital consulting, web production, online marketing, video production, and directory management.
Founded and co-led an in-house business startup at the junction of marketing technology, machine learning, and data.
Led extensive market research and co-wrote business plan.
Key contributor to the company's strategic plan known as Vision 2020.
Led digital sales to 10x increase over a five-year period, grew traffic 4x.
Drove CMS implementation projects to move 100 web sites to new CMS.

— City , State

Designed and implemented a new product development process which improved strategic alignment and sped the flow of new products through the pipeline, as well as leveraging innovation across all divisions.
Grew digital sales 60% and web traffic 50% the first full year in position, with strong >50% annual growth the following two years.
Led digital product sales growth of 10x in eight years.
Developed key metrics to drive the strategic and tactical goals and managed a product portfolio across multiple vertical markets.
Drove implementation of agile product development processes that improved quality & results.

Owned customer data and related processes, led improvements in data gathering, creation, and sourcing processes resulting in achievement of Hilti's top rating globally in data quality.

Developed and implemented e-business project portfolio process that identified, prioritized, and measured business opportunities, resulting in 25% reduced average project delivery time and increased ROI.
Increased customer retention rate 40% and conversion rates over 30% by developing and executing online personalized marketing, grew traffic by 100% via SEO efforts.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Director of Product Management

Location: Georgia, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology, Product Management

Description:
Our company is at the forefront of revolutionizing how data and analytics are used to inform strategic decisions across industries. By leveraging state-of-the-art data and thorough analyses, we empower businesses to transcend traditional boundaries and achieve unparalleled success. Our solutions are pivotal for elite organizations across various sectors, providing them with the insights needed to outperform their competition. We seek innovative minds passionate about leveraging data to communicate complex information effectively to diverse audiences. We're on the lookout for a dynamic Technical Product Manager and a visionary Director of Product Management to craft exceptional digital experiences that offer our clients a competitive edge in their strategic operations.About the Role: We redefine industry norms through our commitment to unparalleled data integrity, insightful analyses, and user-centric products. Our goal is to enhance the strategic acumen of our clientele, offering them a profound understanding of operational dynamics to inform smarter decisions. Our expertise is trusted by leading organizations, enriching their strategic capabilities across multiple domains including media, entertainment, gaming, and competitive analysis sectors. Our premier services, including Advanced Analytics Solutions, Insight Platforms, and Custom Data Services, employ cutting-edge technology and in-depth analysis to ensure our clients' success in their respective fields.Position Overview: In the role of Product Strategy Lead for our B2B solutions, you will guide a talented team dedicated to developing and refining digital tools designed for top-performing organizations. This role is pivotal in driving forward business objectives, spurring innovation, and delivering impactful solutions tailored to the needs of our clientele. We value strong leadership, strategic insight, and a comprehensive understanding of product development processes.Core Responsibilities:Team Development:Direct and nurture a group of skilled product strategists, encouraging their career advancement.Oversee all aspects of the product strategist team's development, from recruitment to professional growth.Cultivate a culture of excellence, innovation, and collaboration within the team.Strategic Development & Execution:Establish the strategic vision and developmental roadmap for our flagship solutions, aligning with the company's broad goals.Coordinate with various departments to prioritize projects, efficiently manage resources, and ensure the delivery of top-quality solutions.Utilize iterative testing and data insights to refine product features, enhance user engagement, and promote continuous innovation.Relationship and Stakeholder Management:Collaborate with company leadership to define and implement strategic initiatives, influencing the direction of senior management.Act as a key advisor on product strategy, industry trends, and the competitive landscape.Strengthen relationships with essential stakeholders, including teams, partners, and clients, to collect valuable feedback and inform product advancements.Performance Analysis and Enhancement:Monitor essential metrics to evaluate product performance, aligning team efforts with strategic objectives.Lead optimization efforts through analytical reviews, customer insights, and market studies, improving product offerings to meet the evolving needs of our clients.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or a similar field; a Master's degree or MBA is preferred.At least 5-6 years of experience in product strategy or management, with a proven track record of launching successful digital products or services.Experience in analytics and strategy, preferably with familiarity in our specific data analysis tools.Demonstrated leadership skills, with experience in leading high-achieving teams in product strategy or related fields.Exceptional communication and team-building abilities, capable of inspiring diverse teams and influencing key stakeholders.A deep-rooted passion for innovation, with a commitment to driving advancements in data analysis and strategic planning across industries.

Experience Level (if available): Director
<JD_END>
